metadata.description: **The Eisner Award“winning series returns!** Ricardo Delgado's gorgeous and brutal _Age of Reptiles_ series returns, marking a bold new direction in wordless storytelling! The steaming swamps of Cretaceous Africa teem with prehistoric life and primordial danger in a tale filled with villains, victims, and one of the most dangerous and unpredictable protagonists ever created: the lonely antihero _Spinosaurus aegyptiacus_! * Great for all ages! Without a single word, this book is easily one of the most intriguing pieces I've seen this year.Comic Book Resources
metadata.name: Age of Reptiles
